name: SholiumIncreasedOperator
author: GreenKookie
description:
Stupid mod made by Greenkookie. 
This mod was crafted to be unbalanced and have really dumb joker effects.
The numbers in the parentheses are the specific btd6 versions that the joker effects are referring to.
Other things you might stumple upon including inside jokes, self insert, other things I like and much more.
Have fun.
